More Notes: Increase in housing damage due to increased typhoon intensity by 2085, assuming constant adaptive capacity.

The paper projects potential increases in housing damage by 2085, but specific monetary costs are not directly calculated on this page. Mentions regional R2 values 0.56, 0.24, 0.21 and 0.48 for regressions of windspeed on housing damage; these are not monetary and also are not for adaptation but rather for baseline risk assessment.
